description.displayText: We hired Madalyn (Maddy) in August 2018 after very positive communications with her and her references. We scheduled nearly 40 hours of work with her for early September and confirmed daily part-time work would take place thru June 2019. Three days before her first shift Maddy texted me to say she was canceling two days of work with us to babysit for another family. Maddy made no effort to consult us about this decision nor apologize until we expressed surprise and disappointment at her behavior. Within two hours she had texted me again to cancel the entirety of her commitment to working with our family, explaining that she was not in a position to take on a second job. We found Maddy's actions to be incredibly unprofessional and immature, given her enthusiasm and definitive commitment to caring for our son, mere days before this incident. We strongly caution families to weigh the hardship of finding a "great" sitter only to have them cancel so disrespectfully before hiring Madalyn.

description.displayText: My kids absolutely love Madalyn! She is always willing to get down on the floor and play with them. She makes up games, chases them around, and they all have so much fun together. She is also extremely helpful around the house, helping the kids clean up after they play, and cleaning up the kitchen or the kids' room without being asked. We are very grateful we found her, and highly recommend her.

description.displayText: Madalyn is just so amazing we hired her last night for a date-night. She took care of my 4 year old triplets. My husband and I came home to a beautiful clean home and homemade cupcakes my favorite. Madalyn was just out of this world she kept us updated about our girls and they loved her. We got her contact info from our very close friends who said Madalyn had cared for her kids back when they were babies and she was great. We live in dumbo Brooklyn and we had traveled to the city for our date- night. Maddy also stayed extra time due to traffic and we got home a little later then we anticipated. Maddy took our girls out to the playground which is blocks from our home. She also feed and bathe them. Plus washed their hair which they would never let me do. Thank you Madalyn for being so amazing with our girls and keeping them happy. We will be calling you back in no time for another date-night. Love you Maddy.

description.displayText: We were so lucky to have found Madalyn for a date-night. She was so lovely and caring and responsible with our baby girl who's only 5 months old. We haven't had a date-night in such a long time and one of our friends gave us Madalyn's number and we were just so lucky to hear that our friends thought she was amazing. So of course we called her last minute and she came through for us. She stood with A. for about 6 hours longer then we expected but she didn't mind staying late. She cleaned our home and made sure our little one was feed and put to bed at her  schedule time which was amazing. Thank you so much for loving our baby girl and for being such an amazing person with a big heart. I definitely will recommend Madalyn to anyone who needs a nanny. You little one sure will fall in love with her.

description.displayText: Wow where do I start! Well miss Maddy was amazing with my 4 children. She made it look so easy and effortlessly. She took my children to the park and while she was there she kept me updated on their well being. Also send me very cute photos of them playing and enjoying their time with her. When she took them back home she bathe them, feed them dinner and boy does Maddy cook so amazing. She read them books and sang them a song before bed. Madalyn also cleaned my house and made sure the kids were always safe and sound. My kids still ask about miss Maddy. I recommend her to any family who is looking for an outgoing, funny, loving nanny who will take care of your children as her own. I will definitely be calling her back when I head back to the city! Amazing young women. I can't thank you enough for all you have done for me and my family. We love you Maddy.

description.displayText: Madalyn is a very responsible woman who dedicates her time and effort when it comes to her work, she is very amazing with babies and toddlers, she will go above and beyond for our little ones and make sure everything is neat, clean and tidy. If you're looking for a hard worker to show love and care for your home and/or children, Madalyn is your best choice.
description.originalText: Madalyn is a very responsible woman who dedicates her time and effort when it comes to her work, she is very amazing with babies and toddlers, she will go above and beyond for our little ones and make sure everything is neat, clean and tidy. If you're looking for a hard worker to show love and care for your home and/or children, Madalyn is your best choice.

description.displayText: Madalyn is a wonderful nanny to our children when we need her. She is trustworthy, respectful, loving, caring, patient and a very good cook and an amazing cleaner. She will make your house spotless while still caring for your children. She's our super women. She can do many things at once. We have a baby cam which Madalyn didn't mind at all. We keep a baby cam so we can simply just see our children throughout the day. Madalyn also takes wonderful pictures through out the day with our children and sends them to us to update us on her day. Our children ages 5 and 8 love her very much. They are always asking for her. Madalyn has a gift with children she will treat your kids as her own and always makes sure that your children are happy. Madalyn also potty trained out daughter when she was 1 years old. Madalyn is part of our family and we wouldn't trade her for the world. If your looking to have one of the best nanny's and friend to your family contact Madalyn.

description.displayText: Madalyn cared for my twin boys ages 3. She was very helpful when I had last minute calls from work and had to rush out the house. She's always early and always shows my children love and respect. When she goes out with them to the park she keeps me upstaged with pictures of my boys and always takes a video of them playing which I love. She cooks and cleans without me asking her to. Always makes my children happy and that makes me really happy. She always asks questions which I like. Keeps me updated on my child's potty breaks and naps. I will definitely recommend Madalyn she is awesome we love her. Madalyn also does potty training which is a plus.

description.displayText: Madalyn was amazing with my 3 kids. She's loving, caring, patient and most importantly my kids loved her! She even cleaned my entire house without me asking for housekeeping. If you want someone to treat your children as their own and someone who is on time and always makes sure your kids are loved and safe contact Madalyn.
